name: Katana Arena
description:
Katana Arena is a gory arena fighter with multiplayer support. Survive hordes of different enemies and defeat the final bosses in order to unlock new levels.

Dynamic body slicing
No pre-sliced bodies.

Ragdoll system
Send the enemies flying with your powerful kick or special skills.

Themed arenas
Different themes like asian, medieval and roman.

Character customization
Change your outfit for your liking.

Dynamic weather and daylight cycle
Adjust the weather and daylight and/or let them be fully dynamic.

Upgradeable skills
Earn battle coins by killing enemies and upgrade your skills.

Partial controller support
Can be played with controller but most of the menus require mouse and keyboard.
